results.title: The Risk of Subsequent Miscarriage in Pregnant Women with Prior Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome: A Nationwide Population-Based Study
results.journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ might help to deal with these complex risk factors of @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriages@@@.

results.title: The function of metformin in endometrial receptivity (ER) of patients with polycyclic ovary syndrome (PCOS): a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: As expected, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also improved CPR and reduced @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@MR@@@ in @DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ as a result, clinical pregnancy rate (risk ratio [RR] = 1.26, 95% CI: 1.11-1.43, P = 0.0003), and @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ rate (RR = 0.73, 95% CI:0.58-0.91, P = 0.006).

citations.NLM: Yuan L, Wu H, Huang W, Bi Y, Qin A, Yang Y. The function of metformin in endometrial receptivity (ER) of patients with polycyclic ovary syndrome (PCOS): a systematic review and meta-analysis Reprod Biol Endocrinol. 2021 Jun 14;19(1):89. PMID: 34127011

results.title: Metformin for miscarriage prevention in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a trustworthiness assessment revisited.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ prevention in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@: a trustworthiness assessment revisited.

results.title: Lights and shadows on the use of metformin in pregnancy: from the preconception phase to breastfeeding and beyond
results.text_hl: There was no evidence of a difference in live birth rate between the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and control groups (OR 1.23 95% CI 0.74-2.04), even dividing the two subgroups by BMI, or in @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ rate (OR 0.58 95% CI 0.24-1.39).

results.title: Immunomodulatory Effects of Metformin Treatment in Pregnant Women With PCOS
results.text_hl: We have previously shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces the risk of @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@late miscarriage@@@ in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, but an immunological involvement in this effect has not been determined.

citations.NLM: Ryssdal M, Vanky E, Stokkeland LMT, Jarmund AH, Steinkjer B, Løvvik TS, Madssen TS, Iversen AC, Giskeødegård GF. Immunomodulatory Effects of Metformin Treatment in Pregnant Women With PCOS J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2023 Mar 14;():. PMID: 36916886

results.title: Preconception and first trimester metformin on pregnancy outcomes in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Indirect comparisons of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ continued through first trimester vs @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ stopped once pregnant consistently demonstrated a trend favouring the continuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@: clinical pregnancy OR 1.16 (95% CI 0.74-1.83), @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ OR 0.44 (95% CI 0.17-1.16) and live birth OR 1.14 (95% CI 0.41-3.13).

citations.NLM: Cheshire J, Garg A, Smith P, Devall AJ, Coomarasamy A, Dhillon-Smith RK. Preconception and first trimester metformin on pregnancy outcomes in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Am J Obstet Gynecol. 2025 Jun 3;():. PMID: 40473092

results.title: Research progress of metformin in gestational diabetes mellitus: a narrative review.
results.text_hl: Recent research has also highlighted the clinical value of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with its application for @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@) treatment, reducing @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@gestational hypertension syndrome@@@ risk along with @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ rate in early pregnancy; however, there is no clear consensus regarding the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ pertaining to its effects on @DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@fetal malformation@@@, long-term growth and development of offspring, @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, and maternal and infant outcomes.

citations.NLM: Ouyang H, Al-Mureish A, Wu N. Research progress of metformin in gestational diabetes mellitus: a narrative review. Ann Palliat Med. 2021 Mar;10(3):3423-3437. PMID: 33849126
citations.BibTeX: @article{33849126, title={Research progress of metformin in gestational diabetes mellitus: a narrative review.}, author={Ouyang H and Al-Mureish A and Wu N}, journal={Ann Palliat Med}, volume={10}, number={3}, pages={3423-3437}}

results.title: Association of insulin resistance with in vitro fertilization outcomes in women without polycystic ovarian syndrome: potential improvement with metformin treatment.
results.text_hl: Alternatively, @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ exposed to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ had a higher risk of clinical pregnancy [53.9% vs 35.9%; aRR = 1.467 (1.137-1.892) P = 0.003], lower risk of clinical @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ [13.7% vs 26.3%; aRR = 0.481 (0.288-0.804), P = 0.005], and higher live birth rates [40.2% vs 9.6%; aRR = 4.069 (2.445-6.774), P < 0.001] than unexposed @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Albert AB, Corachán A, Juárez-Barber E, Cozzolino M, Pellicer A, Alecsandru D, Cervelló I, Ferrero H. Association of insulin resistance with in vitro fertilization outcomes in women without polycystic ovarian syndrome: potential improvement with metformin treatment. Hum Reprod. 2025 May 29;():. PMID: 40441707

results.title: Polycystic ovarian syndrome and miscarriage in IVF: systematic revision of the literature and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: In @DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@IVF@@@ pregnancies the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ was significantly increased when considering @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriages@@@ in total (RR = 1.59; CI = 1.45-1.75), preclinical @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriages@@@ (RR = 1.59; CI = 1.35-1.88), and early @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriages@@@ (RR = 1.44; CI = 1.16-1.79).

citations.NLM: Matorras R, Pijoan JI, Laínz L, Díaz-Nuñez M, Sainz H, Pérez-Fernandez S, Moreira D. Polycystic ovarian syndrome and miscarriage in IVF: systematic revision of the literature and meta-analysis. Arch Gynecol Obstet. 2022 Sep 4;():. PMID: 36058943
